data: Après la mort de ses deux enfants en 1913, la danseuse mythique Isadora Duncan a composé un solo d'adieu intitulé "La Mère". Un siècle plus tard, quatre femmes font la rencontre de cette danse bouleversante. (Following the death of her two children in April 1913, the legendary dancer, Isadora Duncan, created a farewell solo entitled “Mother” which in a moment of extreme tenderness, a mother cradles her child for the last time before letting him go. A century later, four women encounter the heartrending dance.)

Après la mort de ses deux enfants en 1913, la danseuse mythique Isadora Duncan a composé un solo d'adieu intitulé "La Mère". Un siècle plus tard, quatre femmes font la rencontre de cette danse bouleversante.

Following the death of her two children in April 1913, the legendary dancer, Isadora Duncan, created a farewell solo entitled “Mother” which in a moment of extreme tenderness, a mother cradles her child for the last time before letting him go. A century later, four women encounter the heartrending dance.
